title: About Superteam Vietnam
description: Superteam Vietnam is the branch of the Superteam community development initiative in Vietnam. Its core members include individuals with expertise in software development and construction, such as programmers, designers, operators, and marketers.

title: Superteam Vietnam Missions
description: Superteam Vietnam has two main missions: helping products (and founders) build on Solana succeed, and training and consulting to attract more talent into the Web3 ecosystem.

title: Superteam Vietnam & DePHY: Decentralizing IoT in Hanoi
description: Join Superteam Vietnam and DePHY’s CEO on February 7 in Hanoi for an exclusive dinner focused on empowering IoT builders to decentralize and reward their businesses through DePIN mechanisms. Perfect for developers and entrepreneurs in the IoT space, this event includes inspiring discussions, success stories, networking opportunities, and actionable insights.

title: Jito TheGrid: Final Battle
description: See the brightest minds in Web3 solve the hottest problems in the Solana ecosystem with Jito tech. The final battle of Jito TheGrid Hackathon takes place virtually on February 12.

title: Join Superteam Vietnam
description: Superteam Vietnam offers a step-by-step pathway for individuals to build products on Solana, connect with a vibrant community, and earn through grants and bounties in the blockchain and Web3 ecosystem.

title: Step 1: Build Products on Solana
description: Join the free 6-week Solana programming course to gain practical knowledge from leading developers in the Solana ecosystem. Learn the skills needed to build innovative products on Solana.

title: Step 2: Join the Superteam Vietnam Community
description: Meet and connect with active Superteam members in Vietnam through Discord and real-life events. Engage with like-minded individuals passionate about blockchain and Web3.

title: Step 3: Earn Money with Grants & Bounties
description: Submit ecosystem development ideas (grants) or participate in bounties to earn income from Web3-related projects. Explore opportunities to monetize your skills in blockchain.

title: Study with Superteam Vietnam
description: Superteam Vietnam provides courses and learning materials to help members enhance their knowledge and skills in the blockchain field. Join now to deepen your understanding of blockchain and Web3.

title: Earn Money with Superteam Vietnam
description: Explore various earning opportunities through blockchain and Web3 projects. Leverage your skills and earn extra income from innovative activities and collaborations.

title: Superteam Vietnam Community
description: Superteam Vietnam creates a connecting environment for blockchain and Web3 enthusiasts. Exchange ideas, learn from others, and collaborate on shared projects in a vibrant community.

title: Follow Superteam Vietnam on Twitter
description: Stay updated with the latest news, events, and opportunities by following Superteam Vietnam on Twitter.

title: Follow Superteam Vietnam Blog
description: Read detailed articles and insights about blockchain, Web3, and the community on the Superteam Vietnam blog.

title: Check here for job opportunities
description: Check the spreasheet for job opportunites in vietnam.

title: Organize with Superteam Vietnam PizzaFund
description: If you’re interested in organizing an event or initiative, apply to the Superteam PizzaFund for support. Follow the instructions to kickstart your idea.
